businessProfile.name: Root's Place Burgers & More
businessProfile.address: 66 NW State St, American Fork, UT 84003, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 66 NW State St, American Fork, UT 84003, USA

reviews.text: Kept driving by this place and was like I need to try it and today I finally did. Super glad I went in and a cool guy named Josh asked if it was our first time in and he proceeded to let us know what's great and popular on the menu. Service and atmosphere were great but the burgers were omg soooo good üëç love how big they were and we'll presented. They tasted amazing and I will definitely be coming back to try more. The Mac and cheese was good as well even though it seemed to be made with Velveeta cheese base. The Cole slaw I really enjoyed as well. If any feedback for things to work on I'd say different cheese for the Mac and maybe to work on the salads a bit. Salad we ordered was a bit underwhelming but hey even if they only had burgers that's what they get right 100%. Also the cost to add a combo was quite a bit extra but makes sense when the side is good as well. Bathrooms were also kept up and the place was really clean. üëå Thanks again for the help Josh and it's good to see someone passionate about their work and just doing a great job providing service in general.

We visited Roots for the first time and had a great experience. We were unsure what to order and the staff were so friendly and helpful in pointing out favorites and different sides. I got the farm burger and it was delicious, just way too much for me! My husband ordered the Yellowstone and liked it as well. The fries were good and we also tried the cheese curds which were excellent, my husband raved about them even a day or two after. I'm sure we'll be returning!

Breakfast burrito was phenomenal. Filled with crispy potatoes, the meat of your choice, and plenty of eggs.

The perfect addition was their sweet chile verde sauce that made this a must-return experience for me.

Josh, I believe took our order and he gave us the best recommendations.

Great option for breakfast ‚Äî will definitely be coming back to try their burgers, as that‚Äôs what they seem most popular for.

The service was top notch! Lots of helpful people coming around to always check on you and making sure everyone was good.
The burgers and sides were all great quality, huge portions! Unique and fun variety, I‚Äôll definitely be back to try more! I also liked the soda bar with lots of flavor options.
My only complaint, use a full piece of lettuce instead of cut lettuce so it doesn‚Äôt all fall off the burger. Maybe have rolls of paper towels or something at the tables because the burgers can be pretty messy (in a good way).

Nice place for yummy $15 burgers that you order fast-food style at the counter. I can't tell the if the name has anything to do with being a healthy-food place, but the sign on the door hints that Root is just the name or nickname of the founder. However, that said, they do have some nice salad options (especially for a fastfood-style establishment). I really enjoyed the island burger. And my daughter liked her Mac and Cheese kids meal.

recentReviews.text: Great experience at Roots Place. Food was great and fresh, fry‚Äôs were on point, and service was amazing. The owner came out and checked on how everything was while we were eating as well, you could tell he really cared! Loved that.
The food and service were amazing! The menu had a lot of variety!
It was good. His eyes were dreamy, his jokes hysterical, and I got lost in his words. A pretty solid date as far as they go. Oh yeah, the hamburger was good too.
nothing was wrong with the food, the buns were awful. clearly store bought. but $30 for a burger fries and a drink? you gotta be kidding me. not for counter service
Such a great little pla e to eat.  Good food and good people.
They had real onion rings, good beef pattys, and friendly employees.

Breakfast burrito was phenomenal. Filled with crispy potatoes, the meat of your choice, and plenty of eggs.

The perfect addition was their sweet chile verde sauce that made this a must-return experience for me.

Josh, I believe took our order and he gave us the best recommendations.

Great option for breakfast ‚Äî will definitely be coming back to try their burgers, as that‚Äôs what they seem most popular for.
Amazing burgers. Pricey but worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Wright
detailedReviews.text: Great experience at Roots Place. Food was great and fresh, fry‚Äôs were on point, and service was amazing. The owner came out and checked on how everything was while we were eating as well, you could tell he really cared! Loved that.

detailedReviews.author: Tessa Freeman
detailedReviews.text: The food and service were amazing! The menu had a lot of variety!

detailedReviews.author: Meg Marie Johnson
detailedReviews.text: It was good. His eyes were dreamy, his jokes hysterical, and I got lost in his words. A pretty solid date as far as they go. Oh yeah, the hamburger was good too.

detailedReviews.author: raenen flynn smith
detailedReviews.text: nothing was wrong with the food, the buns were awful. clearly store bought. but $30 for a burger fries and a drink? you gotta be kidding me. not for counter service

detailedReviews.author: Scott Allen
detailedReviews.text: Awesome!!

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Talley
detailedReviews.text: Such a great little pla e to eat.  Good food and good people.

detailedReviews.author: Glenna Ann Thomas
detailedReviews.text: They had real onion rings, good beef pattys, and friendly employees.

detailedReviews.author: David Tenney
detailedReviews.text:
Breakfast burrito was phenomenal. Filled with crispy potatoes, the meat of your choice, and plenty of eggs.

The perfect addition was their sweet chile verde sauce that made this a must-return experience for me.

Josh, I believe took our order and he gave us the best recommendations.

Great option for breakfast ‚Äî will definitely be coming back to try their burgers, as that‚Äôs what they seem most popular for.

detailedReviews.author: Cody Frisby
detailedReviews.text: Amazing burgers. Pricey but worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Ben Campbell
detailedReviews.text: Got the island burger and it was freaking amazing my wife got the farm burger and loved it as well. The Fries and cheese curds were perfectly crispy and seasoned just right. The shakes were decent , they could use more flavor but overall very good experience will definitely come back

detailedReviews.author: M W
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic burgers, fries are meh, onion rings are passable, restaurant is tidy but smells like a high school gym locker room.

detailedReviews.author: Peter Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Best burgers ever!!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Wilson
detailedReviews.text:
OMG!
BEST BURGER I HAVE HAD IN YEARS!
Well worth the price.
Fresh,  tonz of flavor
I couldn't  finish it but now I have a midnight  snack..
I had the smokehouse  and can't wait to try all the other's  they have to offer.
Must try if you haven't.
My New Go To Place.
Can't wait to take my daughter and her boyfriend when they come to town.
Hands down the BEST!

detailedReviews.author: Todd Wilkins
detailedReviews.text:
Very surprised at how fast i received my meal.
Super fresh taste. Had a ton of flavor.
So good. I would recommend this place to anyone.
This was my first experience eating here. I see myself becoming a regular.

detailedReviews.author: Jayson Sevison
detailedReviews.text:
Bland food that looks great like the pictures but totally lacks flavor. Boo!

I‚Äôd normally let it be, but after $50 for two combos, I was very underwhelmed. üëéüèª

detailedReviews.author: Rem Eddie
detailedReviews.text: Surprised me. Very flavorful and above average fast food

detailedReviews.author: Nathan Barlow
detailedReviews.text: Josh was great!

detailedReviews.author: Mary ann Frazier
detailedReviews.text: Amazing

detailedReviews.author: Silverio Torres
detailedReviews.text: Food and people are great

detailedReviews.author: Shawna Baker
detailedReviews.text: Its pricy but you get what you pay for. The food is super fresh. Everyone is super nice!!!

detailedReviews.author: Shane Pedroni
detailedReviews.text: Kept driving by this place and was like I need to try it and today I finally did. Super glad I went in and a cool guy named Josh asked if it was our first time in and he proceeded to let us know what's great and popular on the menu. Service and atmosphere were great but the burgers were omg soooo good üëç love how big they were and we'll presented. They tasted amazing and I will definitely be coming back to try more. The Mac and cheese was good as well even though it seemed to be made with Velveeta cheese base. The Cole slaw I really enjoyed as well. If any feedback for things to work on I'd say different cheese for the Mac and maybe to work on the salads a bit. Salad we ordered was a bit underwhelming but hey even if they only had burgers that's what they get right 100%. Also the cost to add a combo was quite a bit extra but makes sense when the side is good as well. Bathrooms were also kept up and the place was really clean. üëå Thanks again for the help Josh and it's good to see someone passionate about their work and just doing a great job providing service in general.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Danner
detailedReviews.text: Sorry I didn‚Äôt take a picture before I started eating but it looked so good I forgot to 10/10 could it be the best burger in Utah as 280 pound man I would say I have tried burgers all over the state and this blew me away is in the conversation of the best for sure !!! Not the cheapest but it‚Äôs worth it trust me and TREAT YO SELF .

detailedReviews.author: Lydia Balderree
detailedReviews.text: Food is great. Loud. Staff doing great üëç

detailedReviews.author: T Monson
detailedReviews.text: Great food and good customer service

detailedReviews.author: Jen Barney
detailedReviews.text: Breakfast is just as amazing as the burgers!

detailedReviews.author: Sam Greer
detailedReviews.text: Food was good. I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars because it‚Äôs the same as other burger joints but this costs $16 for a burger. Crazy.

detailedReviews.author: Scott D.
detailedReviews.text: Nice place for yummy $15 burgers that you order fast-food style at the counter. I can't tell the if the name has anything to do with being a healthy-food place, but the sign on the door hints that Root is just the name or nickname of the founder. However, that said, they do have some nice salad options (especially for a fastfood-style establishment). I really enjoyed the island burger. And my daughter liked her Mac and Cheese kids meal.

detailedReviews.author: Staci Sprague
detailedReviews.text: The (what I assume) is the owner was very welcoming. Came over and gave us a tour of the menu, and provided suggestions. We had a group of about 7 adults and were able to put tables together to sit. These burgers are priced high because they are HUGE. In and out is just down the street and I am a fan of their food but this burger is the equivalent of 3 in and out burgers. Hence the price. I personally got their Tomato Tango and it was PHENOMENAL. Big bruschetta fan and this was the burger form. I had tried their salad once before and wasn‚Äôt a fan of the cold chicken. Just like with every other place you go to stick to what they are good at. Would love to try their breakfast sometime. Also the fries were fresh hot and perfectly seasoned. Overall, a great experience and even better food. Support local because I would love this place to stick around!

detailedReviews.author: Tim Van Dyke
detailedReviews.text: If you're looking for great burgers that are unique this is the place.

detailedReviews.author: Darth Futuza
detailedReviews.text: Great burgers, but pricey (worth it).

detailedReviews.author: Tom J
detailedReviews.text: We went here for my wife's birthday. These were some of the best burgers we've ever had. Are they a bit pricey? Yes. Are they worth every penny of it? YES.

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Cook
detailedReviews.text: Tried Roots for the first time this weekend. Was impressed with Josh who gave us a tour of the menu and recommendations. We ordered off the regular menu and secret menu and were impressed with both burgers. Definitely want to come back and try breakfast or something else from their wide variety.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Brimhall
detailedReviews.text: We tried this place for the first time today and the staff couldn‚Äôt have been nicer! The inside was clean and it was a great experience. I would have to say the biggest downfall was the salt‚Ä¶. I got the toadstool burger and it was great! But it was very, very salty. When I looked at it, I could see that after they topped the burger with onions and mushrooms I could see fresh salt and pepper on top of the mushrooms. The onion rings were awesome‚Ä¶. But oh my goodness they were so salty. My wife got the Farm Burger and it was great! I think the Tender that comes on the burger uses the same batter as the onion rings because it was just so salty. We love seasoned food but it was a touch too much. I would 100% go back, maybe they just had a hole in their salt shaker! But that would be my only complaint. But even with the over salted food it was a great experience.

detailedReviews.author: Bryson Cummings
detailedReviews.text: Good burgers, okay fries but a bit pricy. Probably not a family dinner kinda place.

detailedReviews.author: Megan Pollmann
detailedReviews.text: Got the diablo burger with half and half garlic parm fries and cheese curds. Burger had a nice burn to it and I would highly recommend the cheese curds. Fantastic food and very helpful staff

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Pollmann
detailedReviews.text: Omg everything was so good. Unique, big portions, and delicious!! Josh helped us at the front and went out of his way to make sure we had a good rec and what was good based on our tastes. This is a diners drive ins and dives segment waiting to happen. Do yourself a favor and get something.

detailedReviews.author: Joel Hilton
detailedReviews.text: The food was hot and fresh, and the employees were friendly & helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Kaden Sundquist
detailedReviews.text: Roots Place NAILS IT every time! The burgers are SOOOO good, the customer service is always exceptional, everything is great!

detailedReviews.author: matthew nelson
detailedReviews.text:
Food here is excellent. Our burgers were delicious! Yellowstone and Pub burgers. With onion rings and fries. Onion rings are fat and thick...so tasty. The burgers are huge. Well worth the price. The burgers are made ton order so they do take a few mins extra. But we had our food in 10-15 mins.

This place for me is a solid 4-4 1/2 stars, and not 5, for just 1 reason...I love a little pink in my burgers. Had I had the option of a medium cooked burger,  this place would have been 5 stars.

And who ever was running the place, was extremely helpful and kind. He came out to the line and asked us if we had questions about the menu and gave us a list of favs.

detailedReviews.author: Chelsee Richens
detailedReviews.text:
To quote my sister: ‚ÄúThat is some of the best food from a restaurant I‚Äôve had in a long time.‚Äù
It was delicious, large portions, fresh and tasty.
I got the Yellowstone burger on a bed of lettuce with a side salad. Will be back! I ate an onion ring before we took a pic.

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Davis
detailedReviews.text: Really good selection of food with amazing flavors

detailedReviews.author: Nate
detailedReviews.text: Really fun spot in American fork. Portion sizes are great, food was delicious, and the soda syrups are fun to mix in. Total cost of the burger,sides, and drink was $25.

detailedReviews.author: Anderson Savage
detailedReviews.text: Impressed with the service, food quality, and cleanliness!

detailedReviews.author: Asaicia Fuchs
detailedReviews.text: The food was amazing. My daughter even loved the Mac n cheese, and she‚Äôs usually extremely picky. The service was also outstanding!

detailedReviews.author: Isabella Brooke
detailedReviews.text: Amazing service and amazing food! We‚Äôve been here several times and absolutely love it

detailedReviews.author: AnDi Duffin
detailedReviews.text: I hate hamburgers and I love this place. Super good food with awesome customer service. Dhenrick is a vibe. He has a huge smile on his face and is super kind :)

detailedReviews.author: Tina T
detailedReviews.text: The staff was great and the food was delicious. They came out from behind the counter to help us with the menu. They seemed to do this with anyone who was a first-timer. They are very attentive to their customers, especially for a counter-serve style restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Oxborrow
detailedReviews.text: We visited Roots for the first time and had a great experience. We were unsure what to order and the staff were so friendly and helpful in pointing out favorites and different sides. I got the farm burger and it was delicious, just way too much for me! My husband ordered the Yellowstone and liked it as well. The fries were good and we also tried the cheese curds which were excellent, my husband raved about them even a day or two after. I'm sure we'll be returning!

detailedReviews.author: Logan Huff
detailedReviews.text: I love the burgers here. They are creative, fresh, and delicious. The manager always greets us and is very friendly. The food is a little slow and pretty dang pricey, but I usually think it's worth it

detailedReviews.author: Podatix
detailedReviews.text: The food is nice, high quality ingredients and variety but there are another options with better prices, I found it a little expensive.

detailedReviews.author: Courtney C.
detailedReviews.text: These burgers are absolutely phenomenal.

detailedReviews.author: Jenny Madrigal
detailedReviews.text: The staff is very helpful with suggestions and answering questions without making me feel rushed. Food portions to cost are pleasantly surprising.  The food was very yummy.  The facility is  very clean.

detailedReviews.author: Jake Russell
detailedReviews.text: Excellent burger joint. Freshly made so expect a small wait time but it‚Äôs very worth it.

detailedReviews.author: K
detailedReviews.text:
Idk what the hype is. This place is not good at all. I‚Äôve had a chicken sando before and it was alright but I just tried their burger, it was a 3/10.

Burger patty had no salt, no seasoning and the fries were over cooked and no flavor at all either.

Sorry but I‚Äôm tired of these 5/5 star reviews everyone gives nowadays. This place is alright.

detailedReviews.author: Walker White
detailedReviews.text:
This place was amazing. It was my wife and I‚Äôs first time eating here and while going over the menu we were greeted by a worker and given a few recommendations which was very pleasant.

We got our food and were both surprised by how much food was given. Each burger comes with a 7 oz patty as well as the specialty you want. There are lots of unique burgers that all looked very good. I went with the burria burger and my wife ordered the island burger with garlic parm fries. And all of it was extremely delicious. We will definitely be returning here to try the rest of the menu. 10/10 experience and highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Michelle McKee
detailedReviews.text: This is a top tier burger place! The service was wonderful and the food was perfection. Burgers were messy in the best way. Super flavorful and cooked well

detailedReviews.author: Molly Loveless
detailedReviews.text:
This place is amazing! My boyfriend and I came here for a dinner and had the best experience.

First and foremost the food is incredible! The burgers are so unique and a good portion size. Their house made aioli was divine. They have a cool option to try two smaller portion sides together instead of having to pick just one, this was perfect cause I‚Äôm very indecisive lol.

Second, the employees went above and beyond with their service! We were immediately greeted by a friendly and personable cashier who offered suggestions since it was our first time. We received our food quickly and the employee who gave us our food got us a separate tray to share and was very happy/friendly. We were very impressed!

Highly recommend coming here if you‚Äôre craving a good burger! üçî

detailedReviews.author: Kenna Christopherson
detailedReviews.text:
Let me put y‚Äôall on real quick: Root‚Äôs Place Burgers & More is that spot.

From the moment I walked in, the energy was warm, welcoming, and straight-up feelin‚Äô like Sunday dinner at your cool auntie‚Äôs house. The staff? Whew‚Äîso freaking nice, it almost threw me off. You ever been somewhere and the folks are so friendly you‚Äôre lowkey wondering if they know you from somewhere? That‚Äôs the vibe here. They treat you like fam, not just a customer.

And baby‚Ä¶let‚Äôs talk about the food. I came for a sandwich and left with a whole new standard for what comfort food should be. Every bite slapped‚Äîjuicy, flavorful, built just right. But what stole the show? THE CHEESE CURDS. Listen. These things are garlicky, gooey, and crispy like a fresh fade‚Äîlegit some of the best I‚Äôve ever had. Crunch on the outside, melty magic on the inside. They really said, ‚ÄúWe don‚Äôt play when it comes to snacks.‚Äù

And shout out to the staff again for the fire recommendations‚Äîthey clearly know their menu like a playlist they‚Äôve had on repeat. You can tell they care, and that makes the whole experience hit different.

If you‚Äôre anywhere near Root‚Äôs Place and you don‚Äôt stop in, you‚Äôre playing yourself. Great food, bomb vibes, and people who make you feel like you belong. 10/10‚ÄîRoot‚Äôs ain‚Äôt just a burger joint, it‚Äôs a whole mood.

detailedReviews.author: Aaron Earl
detailedReviews.text: Great food

detailedReviews.author: John McDonald
detailedReviews.text: Imagine you LOVE hamburgers and beer. Now imagine you've gone to hamburger heaven. This is where you be. The staff is super friendly and helpful..i mean amazing! They come out to greet you, help you decide, give you the low down and are just great people. Great beer selection for a hole in the wall joint in dry ass utah where all the drinks are watered down. The onion rings are good but the fries are where its at! Now for the burger.....im speechless...really, i have a little tear in my eye just thinking about this delectable slice of heaven. The meat is amazing, super juicy, all the veggies are crisp and fresh, the bun....oh man, thr bun, fresh and chewy..they grill it a but to add some extra flavor and....on first bite, you'll know you arrived at heavens gates.....the burger kind...not the momon kind. Anyhow, if you're searching for a life changing burger, one that will throw your career into overdrive, one that will supercharge for ferrari, one that will make your girlfriend finally respect you.....ok, it def wont do that, but you gotta eat here. Take it from me...i've put on 10lbs eating here every day for a month. The owner wrote me into his will!! Crazy. I love this place!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Douglas Warnick
detailedReviews.text: great burger place

detailedReviews.author: Jill Hardman
detailedReviews.text: Went there for breakfast. It was ok. Bacon was the highlight.

detailedReviews.author: Josu√© Uriel Dominguez
detailedReviews.text: Muy buenas hamburguesas, super recomendadas, amables y de verdad un gran sabor

detailedReviews.author: Camille Purtschert
detailedReviews.text:
Wow, so delicious! I had the bacon chicken sandwich, hold the bun. I think I said, "mm mm" about 10 times! Haha! I cannot wait to go back because I have a list of things I want to try.
My husband got the Islander and seriously... I've never seen so much meat on a burger! So, if you're a meat lover... You'll love it! Fries are yum, too! Great service and clean, modern decor.

detailedReviews.author: Will Cyrier
detailedReviews.text: Great service and very tasty burger and fries.  Best I‚Äôve had in a long time and definitely better than that overhyped place up the street. :)

detailedReviews.author: Michele Hironaka
detailedReviews.text: The hangover burger was incredible. Bit pricey but excellent food.

detailedReviews.author: Becky Bergeson
detailedReviews.text: Good was great! Customer service outstanding. We had a big hot chocolate spill they all helped us clean up and were so kind refilling the drink.  Great experience we will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Skidmore
detailedReviews.text: Great food and awesome staff

detailedReviews.author: Joe Brown
detailedReviews.text:
Bruh! This place really surprised me. The owner was cool and friendly. He greeted me at the counter and made some good suggestions off their menu * There is also a secret menu. I had the triple breakfast. It includes 3 eggs, 3 strips of bacon, 3 sausage patties, hash browns or seasoned potatoes, two slices of toast, and a pancake! It was super good! The over easy eggs were spot on, and the pancake was fluffy and awesome. It was probably the best I've had in my life, tbh. Perfectly crisp, thick cut bacon was really good. I highly recommend Roots Place! Coming back to try the Sweet and Nutty Burger, which is a 1/2 pound patty with grilled onions, bacon, and Nutella! I know...
The restrooms were very clean.

detailedReviews.author: Stephen
detailedReviews.text: I got their chicken sandwich. Way too much mayonnaise on it, and disappointed it was two chicken tenders on a hamburger bun, not a breast of chicken. Very expensive for what I got. Burgers are $15+ and do not include a drink or fries. That will set you back an extra $5-6.

detailedReviews.author: Adell Hammel
detailedReviews.text: I found this place on Google and was attracted by the hot diggity dog, which I ordered when I arrived at the restaurant.  There was an older gentleman manning the counter and I think he was the owner.  He asked me if it was my first time there and I said it was, he quickly told me the three best/most popular burgers on the menu.  He also asked a couple of times if the food was good and if there was anything else I wanted.  For a counter service style "fast food" restaurant, I was really impressed with the service.  Also, there were several drink flavoring syrups that made the sodas more fun.

detailedReviews.author: Aspen Satterthwaite
detailedReviews.text: Skip all of the chains you wanted to go to for your breakfast/lunch or even dinner and go here. The food is extremely cheap but you are for sure getting MORE then you paid for. As someone who doesn't like Chili Verde all that much, that was some of the best I've have ever had and I crave more. What a great atmosphere too. It also wasn't very busy on a Saturday morning?! Max like 7 people, let's fill this place up. Come, bring your whole family and try roots, I promise you will not be disappointed even in the slightest.

detailedReviews.author: Jake Whitney
detailedReviews.text: My girlfriend and I came here cause they provide Gluten Free buns, their burgers are the BEST!!! Extremely friendly people that work here that care of about their customers and care about the taste of the food, and it was my birthday and they gave me a free milkshake, such an amazing place!!

detailedReviews.author: Bobby Helco
detailedReviews.text: In my humble opinion, this is the best burger in Utah county.  Don't forget to get the garlic Parmesan fries and the cheese curds.

detailedReviews.author: Emilee Martin
detailedReviews.text: Excellent, saucey burgers! They also make all burgers with chicken breast if desired and clean the grill and swap spatulas and gloves for those with beef allergies. Staff is SUPER attentive and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Stuart Jennings
detailedReviews.text:
I‚Äôm incredibly confused, and feel bad giving this review. I‚Äôve had Root‚Äôs on my list of burger places to try and had high hopes after all the raving reviews, but I am seriously disappointed.

My burger was incredibly overcooked and dense to the point that it was tough to chew and I couldn‚Äôt finish it (I can‚Äôt remember the last time I had a burger this overcooked). I even had to stand up and double check that they weren‚Äôt serving frozen patties at that price point. I don‚Äôt see many other reviews with this issue, but some complaints about their burgers being pink. I would have much preferred that!

Is there a quality control issue maybe? There‚Äôs no way the reviews could be this positive if my experience was the norm. Unfortunately, it will be extremely difficult to risk trying again with prices even higher than pretty much every other quality burger joint in the area.

The only reason I didn‚Äôt give 2 stars was because the food was very hot, served fresh, and the staff were all very friendly. The burger also at least had a very nice sear, which shows promise that maybe they just made a mistake with mine? I feel bad not giving 5 stars, but as a burger lover, if the meat is bad, no amount of flashy toppings will save it.

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Edwards
detailedReviews.text: First time trying this place incredible burger fresh off the grill literally piping hot. The fries were also super hot. You can tell management really cares that everyone has a great experience. I couldn‚Äôt be more impressed. Shakes are also fire! I‚Äôd recommend a hangover burger ask the hashbrowns on the side at avocado. The over easy egg on the burger  is 10 out of 10.

detailedReviews.author: Gary Stevens
detailedReviews.text: Good but expensive.

detailedReviews.author: Griffin Fanning
detailedReviews.text: Great experience here. Great menu and delicious food. It was our first time and Josh was super informative with everything and friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Devin Young
detailedReviews.text: The food was absolutely amazing. The service was very friendly and helpful. The atmosphere was very well put together and enjoyable. If you like burgers, this place is worth the money.

detailedReviews.author: Allan Minter
detailedReviews.text:
The first time I read this place's menu,  I immediately told my wife about it...she decided to ignore me but we finally made it about a year later when SHE finally read the menu and said "babe, we're going to roots tonight" and oh boy was it worth the wait.

***Disclaimer***
DO NOT go on a first date here as they measure garlic with their hearts and it's the best thing ever...just maybe not your dates favorite!

These guys offer a unique menu and their staff is very personable. You get a hometown feel with these guys.
Is it a bit expensive? Yes. Are the ingredients quality? Yes. Are the burgers huge? Also yes. Worth the money? Yes.

I look forward to trying more food from Roots!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Ludlow
detailedReviews.text: Place is awesome! Food is great and the staff is super friendly. Been to this place 15+ times and everything I have had is really good. Ask for the secret menu!

detailedReviews.author: Savannah Graves
detailedReviews.text: The food is DELICIOUS. Everything is made fresh and the service is amazing. All the staff is so kind! The garlic parm fries and the onion rings are great. We got the farm burger and the OG burger and they were amazing. A good bang for your buck! A lot of food for a good price.

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Wilson
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious burgers, salads and fries! The cheese curds are next level!! The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and helpful!  We are anxious to try their breakfasts soon.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the freshness and flavor of the food, particularly highlighting the burgers and breakfast burritos as standout items. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The personalized and attentive service, including interactions with the owner and staff like Josh, enhances the dining experience and makes customers feel valued. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The variety and quality of menu options, including unique items like the sweet chile verde sauce, make the restaurant a must-return destination for customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: High prices and perceived lack of value - social media marketing can improve this area
Inconsistent food quality, particularly with seasoning and cooking - review management can address this concern
Competition and discovery issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Jessica Wright
positive.text: Great experience at Roots Place. Food was great and fresh, fry‚Äôs were on point, and service was amazing. The owner came out and checked on how everything was while we were eating as well, you could tell he really cared! Loved that.

positive.author: Tessa Freeman
positive.text: The food and service were amazing! The menu had a lot of variety!

positive.author: Meg Marie Johnson
positive.text: It was good. His eyes were dreamy, his jokes hysterical, and I got lost in his words. A pretty solid date as far as they go. Oh yeah, the hamburger was good too.

neutral.author: raenen flynn smith
neutral.text: nothing was wrong with the food, the buns were awful. clearly store bought. but $30 for a burger fries and a drink? you gotta be kidding me. not for counter service

neutral.author: Sam Greer
neutral.text: Food was good. I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars because it‚Äôs the same as other burger joints but this costs $16 for a burger. Crazy.

negative.author: Jayson Sevison
negative.text:
Bland food that looks great like the pictures but totally lacks flavor. Boo!

I‚Äôd normally let it be, but after $50 for two combos, I was very underwhelmed. üëéüèª

negative.author: K
negative.text:
Idk what the hype is. This place is not good at all. I‚Äôve had a chicken sando before and it was alright but I just tried their burger, it was a 3/10.

Burger patty had no salt, no seasoning and the fries were over cooked and no flavor at all either.

Sorry but I‚Äôm tired of these 5/5 star reviews everyone gives nowadays. This place is alright.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
